1x04 -- Apr 25, 2013 -- Ceuf -- PULLED -UNAIRED

Episode 4 was pulled from the schedule in the aftermath of the Newtown massacre and just before the Boston Marathon bombings. 

Portions of Episode 4 are available online as a Web series on NBC.com 
www.nbc.com/hannibal/video/categories/web-series/736808/ 

The webisodes will serve as a bridge 
between Episode 3 and Episode 5. 

The full version of the episode will air outside the U.S. -- However, I do not yet know when or where.

Related news articles...

this site has the full episode. Its Chinese AXN, annoying subs but worth watching the full the episode.

oeuf, not ceuf
However, I do realize that this grammatical error rises right to the top of the show's staff.  Therefore, I can't just blame the downloaders and uploaders.
The French spelling is a ligature of the letters o and e.
Also, when taking the subject matter of this episode into consideration, it makes complete sense that it should be oeuf (french word for egg), and not ceuf.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C5%92
The director/producer CHOSE to not air it on tv in the US, it has NOTHING to do with the network, hence why it is on their site. So stop bitching about it and just enjoy it. FFS
